A

APlayer - Class in <Unnamed>
The parent class of players
APlayer() - Constructor for class APlayer
Empty default constructor
APlayer(Game, char) - Constructor for class APlayer
Default APLAYER constructor that contains the game that the players are in and the symbol of the players

B

blankSymbol - Variable in class Game
Represents an empty slot in the matrix
board - Variable in class Game
Represents the board as a matrix
boardSize - Variable in class Game
Represents the board size

C

col - Variable in class Move
Represents the column
CpuPlayer - Class in <Unnamed>
APlayer subclass that represents the CPU
CpuPlayer(Game, char) - Constructor for class CpuPlayer
Creates the CpuPlayer object
cpuSymbol - Variable in class Game
Represents the cpu's symbol in the matrix

E

executeMove(Move, char) - Method in class Game
Executes a chosen move by changing the slot in the board to whichever player's turn it is

G

game - Variable in class APlayer
Represents the game that the players are in
Game - Class in <Unnamed>
Class representing the game state and workflow.
Game(int) - Constructor for class Game
Creates a new Game object.
GameStats - Class in <Unnamed>
Class representing the stats of TicTacToe
GameStats() - Constructor for class GameStats
Creates the GameStats object and sets the initial values of losses, ties, and wins to 0
gameStatusTie() - Method in class Game
A secondary method that shows the current game status and checks for tie ? if the game is still going on T if there is a tie
getBoardSize() - Method in class Game
Finds the board size
getCol() - Method in class Move
Returns the column that is argued
getGameStatus() - Method in class Game
Shows the current game status and winning/losing conditions ? if the game is still going on X if the player has won O if the computer has won
getRow() - Method in class Move
Returns the row that is argued
getSymbol() - Method in class APlayer
Returns the symbol of the players

H

Creates the HumanPlayer object
humanSymbol - Variable in class Game
Represents the human's symbol in the matrix

L

lineString() - Method in class Game
Creates the horizontal lines in the matrix

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Game
The main method that incorporates the stats, running a single game, and checking to see if the player wants to continue playing afterwards
Move - Class in <Unnamed>
Represents the Move class that contains the board's row and column placement
Move(int, int) - Constructor for class Move
Creates the Move object that sets the row and column to whatever they're called respectively

N

nlosses - Variable in class GameStats
Represents the number of losses the player has
nties - Variable in class GameStats
Represents the number of ties the player has
NumGen() - Method in class Game
A simple number generation in the range of [1,5]
nwins - Variable in class GameStats
Represents the number of wins the player has

P

pickMove() - Method in class APlayer
default method of finding the moves
pickMove() - Method in class CpuPlayer
Method that randomly picks a valid spot for the CPU
pickMove() - Method in class HumanPlayer
Method that allows input from the user for the humanPlayer Only allows two characters that are both valid
players - Variable in class Game
Represents the players, human and cpu
playSingleGame(int) - Method in class Game
Method that implements a single game of TicTacToe that includes the loop for going through turns and checking game statuses

R

recordLoss() - Method in class GameStats
When called, increment losses by 1
recordTie() - Method in class GameStats
When called, increment ties by 1
recordWin() - Method in class GameStats
When called, increment wins by 1
resetGame() - Method in class Game
Resets the board by setting all the slots to the blank symbol
row - Variable in class Move
Represents the row

S

Represents the symbol of the players

T
